p: To the Jailor of St. Louis County Greeting:

You are hereby commanded to have the body of Miles Guba, alledged to be unlawfully detained by you and imprisoned in the Jail of said County, together with the cause of such imprisonment and detention before me, the undersigned at the Law Commissioner's Cort Room in the City of St. Louis, in said County & State, to morrow the 14th day of October 1858 at 4 o'clock P.M. to do and receive what shall then and there be considered concerning the said Miles Guba, the person so imprisoned and detained and have you then and there this writ
Witness my hand this 13th day of October A.D. 1858
Law Commissioner of St Louis County
